# contractes.cat

Independent open-data project about public procurement in Catalonia.

## CLI

- Package: `@gerardgimenezadsuar/contractes-cli`
- Binary: `contractes`
- Install: `npm install -g @gerardgimenezadsuar/contractes-cli`
- Quick help: `contractes help`

## Main CLI commands

- `contractes search-contracts --search "<text>" [--year YYYY] [--nif <id>] [--page N]`
- `contractes search-companies --search "<text>" [--cpv 72,48] [--page N]`
- `contractes search-organs --search "<text>" [--limit N] [--page N]`
- `contractes organ-top-companies --organ "<organ name>" [--limit N]`
- `contractes person-contracts --name "<person>" [--date-from YYYY-MM-DD] [--date-to YYYY-MM-DD]`
- `contractes attribution`

## API base URL

- Production: `https://www.contractes.cat`
- Override for CLI: `CONTRACTES_API_BASE=<url>`

## Attribution

Dataset shown by contractes.cat comes from:

- Dataset id: `ybgg-dgi6`
- Publisher: `Departament d'Economia i Hisenda`
- Source portal: `https://analisi.transparenciacatalunya.cat`
- License/terms: `https://administraciodigital.gencat.cat/ca/dades/dades-obertes/informacio-practica/llicencies/`
